Tool

NameMaximum Flow Path Length
ID27
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2016
Specificationgrid

Description

This tool calculates the maximum upstream or downstream distance or weighted distance along the flow path for each cell based on 'Deterministic 8 (D8)' (O'Callaghan and Mark 1984) flow directions. Reference: O'Callaghan, J.F., Mark, D.M. (1984): 'The extraction of drainage networks from digital elevation data'. Computer Vision, Graphics and Image Processing, 28:323-344

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Elevation Grid (input)ELEVATION
Weights (*)Grid (optional input)WEIGHTS
Output
Flow Path LengthGrid (output)DISTANCE
Options
Direction of MeasurementChoiceDIRECTIONAvailable Choices: [0] downstream [1] upstream Default: 0
